name: W5/10 Zombie Tag
description:
Week Five. Game Five.

This is a little turn based game. You get 3 moves, then the zombies all get 2. WASD moved you around. Try to rescue as many survivors as you can per round. Us the minimap in the top right to keep track of where everyone is. If any survivors die in a round, they will come back as zombies in the next round. Collect 25 survivors to win!
